TopicTitle: Issue with parts textures in VAB menu

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone.

Some days ago i reinstalled mods and find out some problem with parts miniatures. Steam consistensy check was failed, one file (26kb) was re-downloaded. It didn't resolved this issue. 

I performed a clear install, but got the same. Check always fails on this 26kb file, if i launched the game after previous check. Installation to another hdd does not help too. I'm not alone in this situation, one man in steam community replied in my topic about same issue.

Spoiler
Mmm, problem was in -force-d3d11 param
Had that before. Usually appears when I open the game first time after turning on the computer, this happens. Try to close and re open.
